text: What is the standard idiom to walk through a string character-by-character and modify it?
The only methods I can think of are some genuinely stanky hacks related to joining against a result string.

code:
for(int i = 0; i < strlen(s); i++)
{
   s[i] = F(s[i]);
}

text: This is super expressive and says exactly what I am doing.
That is what I am looking for.
